alert.note: Alert for Fergus (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued June 13 at 1:55PM MDT until June 16 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. Winds will shift more so out of the northwest by early Wednesday evening. * WHERE...Fergus County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. For the High Wind Warning, from Midnight tonight to Midnight MDT Tuesday Night. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
